root.title: Nalayhyn inscription, The
root.place: It was reported that a fragment of a wall had been found at mining Nalayhy in 50 km from Ulaanbaatar on right coast of Toly river.
root.investigation: The monument was found by local cattleman in 1930. He gave it to D.D.Bukinich, the researcher. D.D.Bukinich sent a copy and a picture of the monument to A.N.Samoylovich 584. S.E.Malov doubts of reliability of the monument and called it a falsification 585.
